lead_paragraph: BROWN--Ann Fitzpatrick, of Stockbridge, MA, age 66, died peacefully at home January 28th. Beloved mother of Alexander, sister of Nancy, aunt of Casey, creator of Blantyre Relais, her joie de vivre, generosity and elegant spirit will be deeply missed as will the love and light she shared with all. Calling hours February 7th, 3pm-5pm at Blantyre, Lenox, MA. Service on February 8th at 2pm, First Congregational Church, Stockbridge, MA. To view the full obituary go to: finnertyandstevens.com 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BROWN, ANN FITZPATRICK
